CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the appropriate HOMO and LUMO energy levels , an effective balance was produced.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

In this paragraph, HOMO and LUMO are the material names that are mentioned. HOMO stands for Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital, and LUMO stands for Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital. These are energy levels in molecules that are relevant to electron transfer processes.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

In this paragraph, HOMO and LUMO are the only material names that are mentioned. I have removed any ambiguous entities and the valid ones remain in the table. HOMO stands for Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital, and LUMO stands for Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital. These are energy levels in molecules that are relevant to electron transfer processes.
